success.title: Email Verified
success.accountVerified: Your email has been successfully verified. You can now access all features of your account.

failed.title: Verification Failed
failed.tokenInvalid: The verification link is invalid or has expired.
failed.tryAgain: Try using the verification link again
failed.checkEmail: Make sure you're using the most recent verification email
failed.contactSupport: Contact support if you continue having problems
failed.noEmailProvided: No email provided for resending verification
